comments: Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Pitminster.

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of 
    Bishop's Hull Within, Bishop's Hull Without and Oake. See also Table 2, notes 
    (a) and 
    (c).

Created 25.3.1885 from the part of the parish of Bishop's Hull 
    in Taunton Municipal Borough. Abolished 9.11.1921 and added to the parish 
    of Taunton.

Created 25.3.1885 out of the parishes of Bishop's Hull and Wilton. 
    See also Table 2, note (k).

Transferred from Devon to Somerset on 30.9.1896. See also Table 
    2, note (k).
Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Norton Fitzwarren.
Renamed 1952 to become the parish of Kingston St. Mary.

Created 1952 by renaming the parish of Kingston. See also Table 
    2, note (k).

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of St. James 
    Within, St. James Without, Staplegrove and Kingston.

Created 25.3.1885 from the part of the parish of St. James in 
    Taunton Municipal Borough. Abolished 9.11.1921 and added to the parish 
    of Taunton.

Created 25.3.1885 from the rural part of the parish of St. James. 
    Abolished 1.4.1932 and divided between the parishes of Cheddon Fitzpaine and 
    Taunton.

Abolished 25.3.1885 and divided between the parishes of Taunton 
    St. Mary Magdalen Within, Taunton St. Mary Magdalen Without and Stoke St. Mary.
Created 25.3.1885 out of the parishes of Taunton St. Mary Magdalen and West Monkton. Abolished 9.11.1921 and added to the parish of Taunton.

Created 25.3.1885 out of the parish of Taunton St. Mary Magdalen. 
    Abolished 1.4.1932 and divided between the parishes of Stoke St. Mary and Taunton.

Created 9.11.1921 out of the parishes of St. James Within, St. 
    Mary Magdalen Within, Wilton, Bishop's Hull Within, Trull, St. James Without, 
    West Mokton, Bishop's Hull Without and St. Mary Magdalen Without. Abolished 
    1.4.1974 to become the Taunton Deane unparished area. See also Table 2, note 
    (k).
Abolished 1.4.1933 and added to the parish of Orchard Portman.
Abolished 9.11.1921 and added to the parish of Taunton.
